name: Cherry Juice
description:
Our main hero is a simple office worker at a virology research institute. One day he goes to the cosplay office party, drinks too much cherry juice and loses consciousness. Then he wakes up only to find himself in the middle of a strange live action RPG.

Tutorial

Press E to interact with objects.

Press Left mouse button to attack.

Press Shift  to speed up.

Try to collect all documents to to find out the whole story.

Be careful, you will die as soon as you fall into the hands of the enemy.

Все графические решения - готовые ассеты.

Snaps Prototype | Sci-Fi / Industrial

Little Heroes Mega Pack

Музыка разработана самостоятельна
